meanings.sent1: Many automakers are located in Detroit.
meanings.sent2: The automakers are working on developing electric cars.
meanings.sent3: The automakers decided to have a race with their latest models.
meanings.sent4: In the world of automakers, speed is their currency.
meanings.sent5: The competition between automakers is fierce.

meanings.sent1: The automakers have increased production this year.
meanings.sent2: Efficiency is crucial in automakers' operations.
meanings.sent3: The automakers celebrated a record-breaking production month.
meanings.sent4: Automakers strive to streamline their manufacturing processes.
meanings.sent5: The sound of automakers at work filled the factory.
